channel.title: Help with autospawn, itemspawn, etc
channel.description: every time i edit somthing, in either npcdrop, autospawn, or whatever, i save it, compile, and everything. but no matter what, it wont work in my server, is there a special tool i need to do it? or what. sombody help please

item.title: Help with autospawn, itemspawn, etc
item.dc:creator: @jairusmkei jairusmkei
item.description:
@jairusmkei wrote:

well, i didnt even delete anything, there was like a number 1, i would just select it, then type another number. but i’ll try a little more careful i guess

Read full topic

item.title: Help with autospawn, itemspawn, etc
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:2, topic:276106”]If you get an error upon running the server after editing a .cfg file, that usually means you used a space instead of a tab somewhere in that file.[/quote] he is completely right servers are very sensitive just the smallest error even a space in the wrong place will skrew you completely unless you pay atteniton

Read full topic

item.title: Help with autospawn, itemspawn, etc
item.dc:creator: @jairusmkei jairusmkei
item.description:
@jairusmkei wrote:

naw i dont think thats it, all i did was go into like my item file, and go to like firecape, and just change all the numbers, i didnt have to put any spaces at all

Read full topic

item.title: Help with autospawn, itemspawn, etc
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If you get an error upon running the server after editing a .cfg file, that usually means you used a space instead of a tab somewhere in that file.

Read full topic
